author: hlship
msg: Invoke clear() on the validation delegate when rewinding (processing a form submission) since (in the Portlet world), it is likely the delegate is persisting between requests.

author: hlship
msg: Store the Registry in the ServletContext for access by other servlets.

author: hlship
msg: TAPESTRY-320: Properly seperate client-side persisted property data from multiple users.

author: hlship
msg: Split out reporting of stale link exceptions into its own service.

author: hlship
msg: Split out reporting of stale session exceptions into their own service.
Allow simple strings to be contributed into the tapestry.InfrastructureContributions configuration point, not just services.
Allow servlets to start up in either "servlet" or "wml" mode, use the mode to choose how exceptions are handled.
